title: Ticket #1172: Memory leak in GRAM in Globus 5.0.0
description:
Globus 5.0.0 introduces a bad memory leak in the gram client library. The leak occurs on every interaction with the jobmanager and is about 2kB per job for short-running jobs.

More information about the bug can be found at https://bugzilla.mcs.anl.gov/globus/show_bug.cgi?id=6961
remarks:
2010-Feb-03 14:22:36 by jfrey:
Pushed a fix to master for 7.5.1. This applies a patch to the gram client library. The same patch has been submitted to Globus via the bugzilla ticket above.
